content.raw: I believe `test/worlds/lift_drag.sdf` is adapted from [osrf/gazebo/test/worlds/lift_drag_plugin.world](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/676a14f7642c3516e6a779ac276e8898cd7d0f79/test/worlds/lift_drag_plugin.world?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default) and `examples/worlds/lift_drag.sdf` is adapted from [osrf/gazebo/worlds/single_rotor_demo.world](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/src/676a14f7642c3516e6a779ac276e8898cd7d0f79/worlds/single_rotor_demo.world?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default); perhaps we could mention that or provide links somewhere?
content.html: I believe test/worlds/lift_drag.sdf is adapted from osrf/gazebo/test/worlds/lift_drag_plugin.world and examples/worlds/lift_drag.sdf is adapted from osrf/gazebo/worlds/single_rotor_demo.world; perhaps we could mention that or provide links somewhere?
